meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being excessively generous.
meanings.sent1: Her overgenerosities towards her friends often left her with little for herself.
meanings.sent2: The overgenerosities of the wealthy benefactor helped many in need.
meanings.sent3: Despite her overgenerosities, she always made sure to save some for a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: His overgenerosities were like a never-ending stream of kindness flowing from his heart.
meanings.sent5: The town still talked about the overgenerosities of the mysterious stranger.

meanings.sent1: The overgenerosities of the community during the holiday season warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent2: After his many overgenerosities, he found himself in financial trouble.
meanings.sent3: The overgenerosities of the magician were so grand that even the rabbits had too many carrots.
meanings.sent4: Her overgenerosities were like a colorful bouquet of flowers, brightening the lives of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The overgenerosities of the chef in sharing his secret recipes made him a local legend.
